name: lifecare-hospital-management-system
description: LifeCare Hospital Management System - A comprehensive MERN stack application for managing hospital operations, appointments, and patient care.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:dashboard: cd dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:dashboard"
